p.codeblock: public virtual void OnRtmpStreamingStateChanged(string channelId, string url, RTMP_STREAM_PUBLISH_STATE state, RTMP_STREAM_PUBLISH_ERROR errCode)

section.p: The SDK triggers this callback to report the result of the local user calling the or method. When the RTMP/RTMPS streaming status changes, the SDK triggers this callback and report the URL address and the current status of the streaming. This callback indicates the state of the RTMP or RTMPS streaming. When exceptions occur, you can troubleshoot issues by referring to the detailed error descriptions in the error code parameter.
